issue.title: Stealth mode breaks HCaptcha
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0 nightly 34

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Everywhere 

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Experimental filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track header, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Block WebRTC, Block Location API

### Add your comment and screenshots

Seriously your web reporting tool is awful - URL fields keep deleting and replicating contents on mobile.

Anyway

HCaptcha is broken with stealth mode on. I know the filter required to fix it but not how to add it so here it is:
```
@@||hcaptcha.com$stealth,important
```

Without that HCaptcha challenges don't show at all

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Please post an example URL where it is implemented, thank you.
